Case# NSDrawer.State.closedState

macOS 10.0–10.13Deprecated

```
case closedState
```

Deprecated

Drawers are deprecated; consider using NSSplitViewController

## [Discussion](/documentation/appkit/nsdrawer/state-swift.enum/closedstate#Discussion)

The drawer is closed (not visible onscreen).
